Name: Pahop Thai
Review Text: We loved eating here - the best glass noodles I have ever had. The service was lovely and ultimately the family that owned this restaurant were really sweet. The owner beckoned is inside after looking at the menu and we weren’t …

Name: Pahop Thai
Review Text: Seriously cannot understand the bad reviews for this place. This is some of the best Thai I have ever had...and I have had a lot of Thai food! The roasted duck was amazing! The chicken yellow curry was as well. The owner was lovely! Highly recommend this place.

Name: Pahop Thai
Review Text: I don’t usually leave a rating, just feel the restaurant deserve a better rating. The food is great and authentic, the environment may not fancy as you thought but if you are looking for some good Thai food this would be a great option.

Name: Pahop Thai
Review Text: Absolutely delicious food and very good value, particularly the one-plate-meals at the start of the menu. Two of us had a starter, a main course and a beer each and the total bill was under €40 altogether. Friendly but unobtrusive service, and in a great part of the city if you want to visit a good bar after the meal.

Name: Pahop Thai
Review Text: I had a green curry craving and ran over to Pahop Thai. The food was ready quickly, was tasty and there was lots of tofu in my dish! I have eaten here before and am always happy.

Name: Pahop Thai
Review Text:
Terrible service, they treated us very bad and we spend quite some money there.
Toilet very very dirty and just not a nice place.
Too bad because the food was decent but not wow. Canned drinks and tap water €2.

Name: Pahop Thai
Review Text: Worst food ever!!! I ordered pad thai and after a few bites i tossed the food away, it tasted very strange,gooey and dripping in oil and nothing like Thai food, over salted and plain weird. We got very bad food poisoning. Would never EVER recommend this to anyone!

Name: Pahop Thai
Review Text: One of the best authentic Thai restaurants in Amsterdam. Great location and friendly owners.

Name: Pahop Thai
Review Text: Great food and even greater portions in reasonable price.

Name: Pahop Thai
Review Text: Very good food, relaxed atmosphere, very recommend

Name: Pahop Thai
Review Text: Very nice Pad Thai and papaya salad

Name: Pahop Thai
Review Text: Pad Thai was very good but the man that served wasn't too friendly. He might have had a bad day, for the food alone I'd go back.

Name: Pahop Thai

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Really recommended !! Don't be put off by the fact that the tent looks a bit moodless. The food is amazing! The lady who cooks the food is very sweet and gives you advice when you can't choose. The yellow curry is …

Review Text: (Translated by Google) They were looking for an Indonesian restaurant, but they were all busy, at 6.00 pm they were the only visitors here in the evening, the price tag was not cheap, the restaurant was authentic, family, and hung up photos …

Name: Pahop Thai
Review Text: (Translated by Google) A little hidden away between the market stalls is this eatery whose interior is in urgent need of replacement. Or at least a lick of paint. But don't be fooled, the dishes taste excellent. We have already collected …
